Introduction.Headline1: A NEXUS connects North America, ASEAN, and East Asian markets, creating a seamless  flow of entertainment content and bringing mutual benefits to all regions.
Introduction.Headline2: Through our  comprehensive business approach, we maximize the value of entertainment rights while  supporting creators and artists.
Introduction.Headline3: We aim to be the definitive platform holder that delivers  premium entertainment experiences worldwide through strategic integration across the entire  value chain.

News.slide1_head: A NEXUS Begins North American Operations
News.slide1_content: A NEXUS has officially established its North American headquarters in Los Angeles, marking a significant milestone in the company's global expansion strategy. This strategic move strengthens A NEXUS's position as the gateway connecting North American entertainment markets with ASEAN and East Asian regions, enabling seamless rights management and content flow across these diverse entertainment ecosystems.
News.slide2_head: A NEXUS to Host Press Conference in the Philippines
News.slide2_content: A NEXUS to Host Press Conference in the Philippines. April 28, 2025 A NEXUS will be hosting a major press conference in Manila, Philippines to announce our comprehensive entertainment business approach and strategic vision for connecting North American, ASEAN, and East Asian markets.
News.slide3_head: A NEXUS Unveils Global Official Website
News.slide3_content: A NEXUS today launched its global official website, showcasing the company's vision to connect entertainment markets across North America, ASEAN, and East Asia. The new platform highlights A NEXUS's comprehensive business approach to maximizing entertainment value through strategic integration of rights management, content production, and cross-border distribution.

BoardMember.Headline: Meet our visionary leadership team bringing together decades of experience in global entertainment markets.
BoardMember.MemberIntro:
Meet the exceptional minds behind our vision.
From leading global entertainment companies to launching international icons, our board brings unmatched expertise and proven success.
Discover how each member is shaping the future.

Artist.slide1_content:
Quadlips is the first AKB48 group unit formed by selected members from sister groups across Asia.
Announced on October 29, 2023 at BNK48 Cherprang's graduation concert, the group begins activities in Bangkok.
Their global digital debut is scheduled for March 2024.
Starting from Thailand, Indonesia, Japan, and the Philippines, Quadlips will expand across Southeast Asia.
Artist.slide2_content: Singer-Songwriter SHEKI ARZAGA has been playing a major role as a lead vocalist in MNL48 Manila, Philippines which since 2018 has been a very popular sister affiliate of AKB48, the all-female, theatre-based "idol" collective from Japan. Named after the Akihabara area in Tokyo, where the group's theater is located AKB48 is certified as the largest pop group in the world by The Guinness World Records.

Message.Headline: A NEXUS offers comprehensive production and promotion services, from stage design to  original content creation and global marketing campaigns.

Contact.Content: Interested in learning more about investment opportunities or media inquiries? Our team is ready to assist you.

Profile.Profile02: Office Location: 6605 Grand Montecito Pkwy, Suite 100, Las Vegas, NV 89149, USA
Profile.Profile03: Business: Comprehensive entertainment business solutions spanning rights management,content production, cross-border distribution, marketing, and strategic market development across North America, ASEAN, and East Asia

About.CompanyVision: A NEXUS stands at the intersection of global entertainment markets, serving as the vital gateway connecting North America, ASEAN, and East Asian creative economies. We envision a world where cultural exchange through entertainment transcends traditional barriers, creating unprecedented value for creators, investors, and audiences alike. Our mission is to establish the definitive platform for cross-border entertainment rights management and content distribution, leveraging our deep industry expertise and strategic global presence.
About.MarketOverview: The global entertainment and media market continues to experience unprecedented growth, with Asia Pacific emerging as the fastest-growing region. Key trends driving our strategic position
About.BusinessApproach: A NEXUS creates value through an integrated, end-to-end approach to entertainment business

Trends.ContentConvergenceDescription: Boundaries between anime, gaming, film, and music continue to blur, creating demand for comprehensive rights management
Trends.DigitalTransformationDescription: Streaming platforms are revolutionizing content consumption patterns globally
Trends.CrossCulturalAppealDescription: Asian entertainment content is experiencing explosive popularity in Western markets
Trends.EmergingMarketsDescription: ASEAN countries represent the next frontier of entertainment consumption growth
Trends.Text: A NEXUS is uniquely positioned at the center of these converging trends

Business.RightsAcquisitionManagementDescription: Strategic acquisition and optimization of  entertainment IP rights across multiple markets, with specialized legal expertise in cross border licensing
Business.CrossPlatformDistributionDescription: Facilitating content distribution across diverse platforms and  regions, leveraging proprietary technology and market intelligence
Business.ProductionServicesDescription: Enabling content creation through financing, production support, and creative development tailored to both local and global audience preferences
Business.MarketAccessDescription: Providing established channels and cultural expertise for content creators  to successfully enter and thrive in new markets
Business.BrandDevelopmentDescription: Transforming entertainment properties into global franchises  through strategic promotion and localized marketing approaches
Business.TechnologyIntegrationDescription: Implementing cutting-edge digital solutions that enhance  discovery, consumption, and monetization of content across borders
